subject: Leadership
title: Handling Q&A Sessions
description: A quick, practical guide to Handling Q&A Sessions.

hook.text: A leader nails a presentation then crumbles in Q&A. One hostile question unravels 30 minutes of polish. Gone.

buildup.text: Q&A is where credibility is tested. It reveals how deeply you know your material and how you handle pressure.

discovery.text: List the ten toughest questions you could get. Practice answers. If you can handle the worst, the rest is easy.

twist.text: Saying 'I don't know, but I'll find out' builds more trust than a confident wrong answer. Honesty wins over bluffing.

climax.text: Repeat the question, answer concisely, then check: 'Does that address your question?' Stay calm, brief, and open.

punchline.text: The speech shows your preparation. The Q&A shows your depth.

quiz.question: What should a leader do when they don't know an answer during Q&A?
options: Admit it and commit to finding out
